createwiki-desc: Allows authorized users to create new wikis in a wiki farm
createwiki-help-dbname: The internal database name for the wiki (lowercase, alphanumeric, no spaces)
createwiki-help-sitename: The display name for the wiki
createwiki-help-private: Make this wiki private (only visible to authorized users)
createwiki-error-required: All required fields must be filled
createwiki-error-exists: A wiki with this database name already exists
createwiki-error-populate: Failed to populate database with tables
createwiki-success: Wiki "$1" has been created successfully! URL: $2
requestwiki-info: Use this form to request a new wiki. Your request will be reviewed by administrators.
requestwiki-help-dbname: The internal database name for the wiki (lowercase, alphanumeric, no spaces)
requestwiki-help-sitename: The display name for the wiki
requestwiki-help-private: Make this wiki private (only visible to authorized users)
requestwiki-help-reason: Why do you need this wiki? What will you use it for?
requestwiki-error-exists: A wiki with this database name already exists
requestwiki-success: Your wiki request has been submitted! Request ID: $1. You can check the status at Special:RequestWikiQueue/$1
requestwikiqueue-none: There are no pending wiki requests
requestwikiqueue-approved: Request has been approved and wiki created
